title: Donald J. Trump's Salute to American Independence | Paul Rudd
description:
Donald J. Trump reads his book chronicling how America won its independence from Great Britain in honor of the Fourth of July. (You can also head to Late Night on YouTube to see an animated version.)

Then, "Ant-Man & the Wasp" star Paul Rudd talks about showing his kids movies that are inappropriate for their age, Big Slick Celebrity Weekend and why he doesn't want to be too good at bowling.

He also talks to Late Night producer Kevin Miller backstage at Studio 8G just for this podcast.


LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
